details: Issue #764 requested implementation of SocketQUICStream_transition_send() and SocketQUICStream_transition_recv(). These functions are already implemented in src/quic/SocketQUICStream-state.c as of commits aade4b30 and 21c7fc12. The functions use table-driven state machines and all tests pass. No new PR needed - issue is already resolved on main branch.
resolved_by_commits: aade4b30: refactor(quic): extract SocketQUICStream_transition_recv to table-driven state machine
21c7fc12: refactor(quic): extract SocketQUICStream_transition_send to table-driven state machine
